transArray.content: The hotel is located close to the subway station. Parking in the park is free. The front desk service is very friendly. Drinks and fruits are provided upon check-in, which is very good. The breakfast is also very rich, which is very good.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and for your review and approval of the hotel location and front desk service. Your satisfaction is the driving force for our progress. The hotel is located in the Badali Automobile Park on the Fourth Ring Road, and shares parking spaces with the park. There are sufficient parking spaces. , you only need to pick up the electronic parking coupon at the front desk when leaving the hotel to park for free. Public transportation is accessible in all directions around the hotel. It is only a 5-minute walk from Haidian 5th Road Ju Station on Metro Line 6. It is the best choice for your business trip and accommodation. All staff look forward to your every patronage and wish you success in your work! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
